amendment.description: Amendment directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to conduct annual surveys of veterans on experiences obtaining hospital care and medical services from medical facilities of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in House Report 114-742 to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to conduct annual surveys of veterans on experiences obtaining hospital care and medical services from medical facilities of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the O'Rourke amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the O'Rourke amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. O'Rourke.
